mapper.select: select phone_number as mobilePhone from ehrbase_emp_phones where person_id = #{personId} and phone_type = 'M' and date_from = (select max(date_from) from ehrbase_emp_phones where person_id =#{personId} and phone_type = 'M')
select personid as personId, is_remote_senior as isRomoteSenior, workingplace as workingPlace, spouse_living_city as spouseLivingCity from ehrcuc_hmhat_manager_other where personid = #{personId}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( educated_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) educatedStartDate, DATE_FORMAT( educated_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) educatedEndDate, college_name collegeName, profession, ( SELECT meaning FROM hades_lookups WHERE lookup_type = 'CNC_EDU_LEVEL' AND lookup_code = education_experience ) educationExperience, ( SELECT meaning FROM hades_lookups WHERE lookup_type = 'CNC_DEGREE' AND lookup_code = degree ) degree, ( CASE education_high_flag WHEN 'Y' THEN '是' WHEN 'N' THEN '否' ELSE '' END ) educationHighFlag FROM ehrbase_emp_educations tt where tt.person_id = #{personId}

select t1.ORGANIZATION_ID orgId,t1.NAME orgName from ehrbase_organization_all t1 where t1.BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = 101
and t1.name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
and 1=2

select count(1) total from ehrbase_organization_all t1 where t1.BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = 101
and t1.name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
and 1=2

SELECT CONCAT(a.parentFlexValueLow,'--',a.flexValue) name, CONCAT(a.parentFlexValueLow,'--',a.flexValue) value FROM ( SELECT ffv.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID AS flexValuesSetId, ffv.FLEX_VALUE_ID AS flexValueId, ffv.FLEX_VALUE AS flexValue, ffv.PARENT_FLEX_VALUE_LOW AS parentFlexValueLow, ffv.attribute_sort_order AS ord FROM fnd_flex_values ffv, fnd_flex_value_sets ffvs WHERE ffvs.flex_value_set_name = 'CNC_JRZTJ' AND ffv.flex_value_set_id = ffvs.flex_value_set_id AND ffv.enabled_flag = 'Y' UNION SELECT DISTINCT - 9999 AS flexValuesSetId, - 9999 AS flexValueId, ' ' AS flexValue, ffv2.PARENT_FLEX_VALUE_LOW AS parentFlexValueLow, MAX( ffv2.attribute_sort_order ) + 1 ord FROM fnd_flex_values ffv2, fnd_flex_value_sets ffvs2 WHERE ffvs2.flex_value_set_name = 'CNC_JRZTJ' AND ffv2.flex_value_set_id = ffvs2.flex_value_set_id AND ffv2.enabled_flag = 'Y' GROUP BY ffv2.parent_flex_value_low ) a ORDER BY ord

SELECT FLEX_VALUE value, FLEX_VALUE name, flex_value_set_name flexset, PARENT_FLEX_VALUE_LOW parentName FROM fnd_flex_value_sets, fnd_flex_values WHERE fnd_flex_value_sets.flex_value_set_id = fnd_flex_values.flex_value_set_id AND fnd_flex_value_sets.flex_value_set_name IN ( 'CUC_JRTJ', 'CUC_JRZTJ', 'CUC_JRTJSM' ) and fnd_flex_values.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' order by fnd_flex_values.flex_value_set_id,fnd_flex_values.PARENT_FLEX_VALUE_LOW
